thread.title: Westminster terror incident: Donald Trump briefed on knife and car attack near London Parliament
thread.title_full: Westminster terror incident: Donald Trump briefed on knife and car attack near London Parliament

author: Lucy Pasha-Robinson
title: Westminster terror incident: Donald Trump briefed on knife and car attack near London Parliament
text:
Wednesday 22 March 2017 15:46 GMT Click to followThe Independent Online 
Donald Trump has been briefed on the "terrorist incident" outside London's Parliament in which one police officer was stabbed and one man was shot, according to White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer. . @POTUS has been briefed on the situation in the U.K. Continuing to monitor and update â€” Sean Spicer (@PressSec) March 22, 2017 
More follows...
